title: Bajaj Auto plans production cuts amid uncertainties over exports
description: Multiple people aware of the automaker's circumspect production plans told ET that Bajaj Auto, which makes Pulsar and KTM bikes, is likely to produce around 250,000-270,000 units in March, compared with average production of 338,000 units in each of the first nine months of FY23.
